Oil Painting Workshop

Introduction Oil Painting Course

Posted by Art Club on August 30, 2021
@hauki_classroom_ @laidback_painting

Register Now!



你知唔知道Oil Painting Workshop同Free Art Buffet最大嘅分別喺邊度? 😎😎

冇錯啦就係我哋呢一個Workshop係會由專業嘅本地藝術家/導師教你哋！🥳🥳


所以即使你唔識得畫畫都唔緊要！只要參加呢一個workshop，包你畫到滿意為止！🎨✍🏻而且我哋嘅學費收嘅費用卑出邊學平好多！！

平均出邊學畫畫一堂都要$150或以上😢😢但係呢度我哋$160就可以學3堂！！！仲要係每堂三個鐘！！即係話平均每一堂只需要大概50幾蚊/3hours！！

😱😱😨😱🤯😳😱😳😱😳😱所以話真係抵到爛㗎！！


日期：29/9，6/10 以及 13/10

時間：4:30-7:30pm （每一節3小時）

内容：靜物繪畫，顏色理論，基本油畫技巧

費用：

🤩$160/3堂 （只限於會員）*

🤩$200/3 堂 （非會員）

*非會員會在繳費後自動成爲會員


6/9開始接受報名！🤩🤩🥳名額非常有限先到先得！！🥳🥳 請盡早報名！！

如有任何查詢，歡迎係ig 或者facebook dm我哋或者電郵至artclubhkusu@gmail.com


Do you know what the biggest difference between the Oil Painting Workshop and Free Art Buffet is? 😎😎

That’s right! In the Oil Painting workshop, we have invited a professional local artist to guide you on your journey to learn oil painting! 🥳🥳

So, even if you have never tried oil painting or even drawing before, you are still welcome to join us! If you join, we guarantee that you will paint until you are satisfied! Moreover, for the Oil Painting Workshop, the fee we charge is very affordable and way lower than what you can find elsewhere!!

😱😱😨😱🤯😳😱😳😱😳😱


Dates: 29/9, 6/10, and 13/10

Time: 4:30 – 7:30 (3 hours per session)

Content: Still life painting, colour theory, fundamental oil painting techniques.

Fee:

🤩$160/3 sessions (members)

🤩$200/3 sessions (non-members)*

*Non-members will become Art Club member automatically upon payment of fee


Application opens on 6/9! 🤩🤩🥳 Limited quote, first come first serve! 🥳🥳 Signup now!

If you have any questions, feel free to direct message us on social media (IG or Facebook) or send us an email at artclubhkusu@gmail.com
